mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "The Mayfield Unicyclists", "Callerlab Holds Its Eleventh", "Publications, 1984", "Sweepstakes Awards", "A Dance For Recognition", "4th National Canadian Convention", "S/D Comes to the Waltz Capitol", "A Unique College Text" and "Graduation, Japanese Style." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Experimental Notes", "Advanced Dancing", "Mostly Modular", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Contra Corner", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
